meanings.definition: Moirai: the three Fates in Greek mythology who control human destiny
meanings.sent1: In Greek myths, the Moirai spin the thread of life for each person.
meanings.sent2: The Moirai are believed to decide how long a person will live.
meanings.sent3: The Moirai must be very busy weaving destinies for everyone in the world!
meanings.sent4: Just like the Moirai, time seems to weave our fates together in mysterious ways.
meanings.sent5: The Moirai's power over destiny is as unyielding as the strongest metal.

meanings.definition: Moirai: a personification of fate or destiny
meanings.sent1: Some people see the Moirai as symbols of the inevitable fate we all face.
meanings.sent2: Believers in the Moirai think that destiny cannot be escaped.
meanings.sent3: It's almost like the Moirai are playing a game of fate with us all.
meanings.sent4: The Moirai's influence on our lives is as undeniable as the rising sun.
meanings.sent5: The Moirai's presence looms over us like a shadow, guiding our paths.

meanings.definition: Moirai: a group of three sisters who determine the course of a person's life
meanings.sent1: The Moirai are often depicted as three sisters working together to shape destinies.
meanings.sent2: Many stories tell of the Moirai deciding the fate of heroes and villains alike.
meanings.sent3: Imagine the Moirai arguing over which path to choose for someone's life!
meanings.sent4: The Moirai's hands guide our lives like skilled artists painting a masterpiece.
meanings.sent5: The Moirai's touch on our lives is as gentle as a whisper, yet as powerful as a storm.
